data:
JORDAN SMELLS


When inserting images you can make them resize automatically with the tile, as above. To do this just use "background-size: contain" as is done in the ".webreports-htmlwebreport-otimage" css and set the width and height as required. Here we have a fixed height but the width is set using a percentage.


Formatted text returned from WebReport with ID 699160 and name Widget Destination - TileReport.


I can also retrieve dynamic values using WebReports tags e.g. The current user is Admin and the time is Wed Feb 21 11:39:36 2018.


The source for this widget comes from this WebReport: Edit Report


The Content Server Smart UI flavor of Bootstrap is loaded as part of the page which means any styles from the Bootstrap library can be used. Please note that all Bootstrap styles have been namespaced to avoid conflicts when Smart UI components are embedded into external systems. This means any documented Bootstrap classes need to have the prefix "binf-". One other thing to point out is that Bootstrap components may be specifically styled to fit in with the Content Server design so components may look different to the Bootstrap documentation. For example:

Icons from the Bootstrap library can be used as well. For example:

Content Server icons can be loaded too using the relevant css classes. Please see the Smart UI SDK documentation for information on available icons. For example:
